extendedInfo.description: Word Breaker helps you play all of your favorite word puzzle games including Scrabble, Words with Friends, Wordfeud, Angry Words, Upwords, Wordsmith, Words By Post, Crossword Puzzles and more!  The ultimate cheat when you're truly stuck.Features:-Support for all of the popular word games, including: Words with Friends, EA Scrabble, Wordfeud, Angry Words, Wordsmith, and Words By Post.-All new Board Solver mode that will maximize your score.-Screenshot imports: import a screenshot directly into Board Solver mode.  Currently only works with Words with Friends on phone sized devices.  We're working on Wordfeud  support for a future release!-Exclusive "What's left in the bag" screen that shows you all of the tiles left in the bag.-Local dictionary (word definitions are accessed through the internet)-Quick launch button to get you back into your favorite word game fast!-Ground breaking "ghost mode".-Supports blank tiles (wild cards).-Options to filter results based on length.-Move to SD card.Having trouble with ghost mode, try this:Installing the utility app "Auto Memory Manager" (https://market.android.com/details?id=com.lim.android.automemman&hl=en), and make the following changes:1) Selected the "Mild" settings.2) Increased the "Hidden Application" setting to 10MB.3) Power cycle your phone.Note: Firecracker Software LLC is not associated with the Auto Memory Manager app in any way.Reasons to upgrade:Full version is completely ad free.Full version will have earlier access to new features.If you need help maximizing your score at Words With Friends get Word Breaker and then checkout the detailed help instructions at http://firecrackersw.com/apps/wordbreaker/word-breaker-instructions/.This app is in no way associated with Zynga, Inc, makers of the popular game Words With Friends.

reviews.title: Will not import screenshot.
reviews.comment: I have set Word Breaker up to play as EA Scrabble.  I take a screenshot with my galaxy s4 and when I use the import screenshot, it only gives me a default preset option of Words with Friends. It then gives me an import error.  Why can I not set the screenshot to EA??
reviews.author: Darryl Remnant

reviews.title: Broken update
reviews.comment: This was updated a couple of months ago and now the screenshot import just doesn\'t work. No better than the free version. Even after upgrading from its to jb.   Samsung galaxy s2
reviews.author: Chris Stewart

reviews.title: Misses some letters
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t seem to get the whole game on screenshot. Keeps confusing O with D.

reviews.title: Balance of Tiles
reviews.comment: The count of balance tiles is not accurate~please fix it & this app will be the best. Thanks

reviews.title: Worth the $1.99

reviews.comment: I never used his completely awesome app.  I win a lot,  but it\'s because i\'m super-smart.  This app is easy and smart,  but i dont need it...
